entry.tran: (尤指从一笔资金中的)支付，付出，付款
entry.def: Disbursement is the paying out of a sum of money, especially from a fund.
A disbursement is a sum of money that is paid out.

means.word_mean: 1. amounts paid for goods and services that may be currently tax deductible (as opposed to capital expenditures)
2. the act of spending or disbursing money
